headline: Easy Shepherd's Pie
description: An easy shepherd's pie recipe that will be your go-to comfort food with cream cheese and Cheddar to add to the rich flavor of the meat and potatoes.
name: Easy Shepherd's Pie
recipeIngredient: 1 cup KRAFT Shredded Cheddar Cheese, divided

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Brown meat in a large skillet. While the meat is browning, mix potatoes, cream cheese, 1/2 cup shredded cheese, and garlic until well blended.
Drain meat. Return to skillet; stir in vegetables and gravy. Spoon into a 9-inch square baking dish. Cover with potato mixture and remaining 1/2 cup shredded cheese.
Bake in the preheated oven until heated through, about 20 minutes.

Then I added a conservative amount (I didn't want to add too much, because I could always add more but; not take the seasoning away), of the following: garlic powder, onion powder, freshly cracked black pepper and, sea salt and; a couple of shots of Worcestershire sauce. It was better; but still not enough flavor! So, I added more of only: garlic powder, and onion powder and; now the dish had enough flavor! :) I'm sorry, I wouldn't make the original recipe again.
